name: Sunset Samurai
description:
Controls

Up arrow key or W to throw an axe.

Right Arrow Key or D to throw a kunai.

Song is "Best laments the world" by Nujabes. If it sounds like Samurai Champloo's Shiki No Uta, that's because it basically is.

This game isn't really meant to be "fun". Like, it's playable, it's a game. But the goal was moreso to help me learn my way around the godot engine. I moved over from gamemaker because I wanted to make a non 2D pixel art games, and 3D games. I could've picked Unity for that I guess. But, based on some youtube research, godot sounded like it was a faster engine to learn and once you did, you could make games faster as well.

I'm planning on making a "post mortem" and releasing the games source code within the next week for educational reasons. I can't promise that the code is efficient or neat. But it is thoroughly commented on so it should be easy to comprehend.  So it should be beneficial!
